item.title: The Seventh
item.description: Cinearte Palace, Juiz de Fora, 2016 For some time now, it has become a habit to revisit films through the soundtrack. Reflecting on the subject, I realized that many of my cinematic memories are connected to the strength of this audiovisual relationship, especially some scenes closely linked to songs. The playlist below arose from the desire to remember and gather these memories. Far from being just a background, songs are an integral part of the narrative itself when used well.
